Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time with this
Reviews.Author: J. Sheehan
Reviews.Content: Takes too long to shoot with or without flash, by then nothing that isn't already dead [or yourself for that matter] has moved. If you are looking for a cheap camera to get a kid started this is NOT a good idea. I bought it for that reason. I returned it because of the above. Yes, it is cheap, but you are way far ahead to get a starter Kodak or the like for $20-30 more.

Reviews.Title: this is one bad product
Reviews.Author: kenneth sussman
Reviews.Content: bought this and found it was sealed in that cut your fingers plastic. opened it put in the batteries.........nada........changed batteries .......still nada changed batteies again still nada........have returned...all I wanted was a 7 mp to update my carry always 3.2 which was then lost, and now found .....goodbye cheap piece of crap........ i swear major brands from now on!!!!!!!!~

Reviews.Title: Grrrenade is cool!!!
Reviews.Author: JJ "JJ"
Reviews.Content: Got a Grenade for my pup Ridley. The play and chew is cool, he's mauled the nylon chew part down to a stub. It's pretty tough. After a ton of chucking and chewng it's still in one piece unlike other toys that fall aprt right away! One thing I found is if you squeeze it before you throw, it makes sound all the way until it hits the ground. My pup loves that. When can I get the Noodle?!!!

Reviews.Title: Thanks from Winston
Reviews.Author: Dan "Dan"
Reviews.Content: What's funny is, the only reason I am posting if because my Rot-mix received a Squeezie Grenade on accident.  Well I was shopping online and I found the grenade by accident and decided that it was a quality product and bought one.  He (Winston) LOVES it. He doesn't put it down. He even puts it in his food bowl while he eats! It actually give me some free time now as well.  I just wanted to say thanks.
